View Javadoc

1   package org.lindbergframework.persistence.translate;
2   
3   /**
4    * Interface to translator implementation to sql string syntax.
5    * 
6    * @author Victor Lindberg
7    *
8    */
9   public interface SqlStringSyntaxTranslator<T> extends SqlSyntaxTranslator<String,T>{
10     
11     /**
12      * property separator token. 
13      */
14     public static final String PROPERTY_SEPARATOR = ".";
15     
16     /**
17      * reserved string to property separator replacement.
18      */
19     public static final String PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING = "$";
20     
21     /**
22      * property separator replacement escape token.
23      */
24     public static final String PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING_REPLACEMENT_ESCAPE = 
25  	                                 String.format("_%s_", PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING);	
26     
27     /**
28      * property separator replacement string.
29      */
30     public static final String PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_REPLACEMENT = String.format("%s%s", PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING,
31  		   																			PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING);
32     
33     /**
34      * string pattern replacement to split properties based on property separator token. 
35      */
36     public static final String PROPERTY_PATTERN_SPLIT_SEPARATOR_REPLACEMENT = String.format("\\%s\\%s", PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING,
37  		    																				   PROPERTY_SEPARATOR_RESERVED_STRING);
38     /**
39      * string pattern to split properties based on property separator token
40      */
41     public static final String PROPERTY_PATTERN_SPLIT_SEPARATOR = String.format("\\%s", PROPERTY_SEPARATOR);
42     
43  }
